thread.title: Monmatre happiness
thread.title_full: Monmatre happiness - Review of Hotel des Arts - Montmartre, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: Dawn H
title: Monmatre happiness
text:
Totally brilliant small hotel. Staff so helpful and room spotlessly clean.Good shower. Nice buffet breakfast. Great neighbourhood, wonderful shopping, culture and cuisine on your doorstep. Sacr√© Coeur just up the road, and the metro at Blanche just down the road. Receptionist allowed us to store our luggage at the beginning and end of our stay to maximise our enjoyment of our time in this lovely place. We will be back!
